data.wordByWord: سَأَلَ [Asked] سَآئِلٌۢ [a questioner] بِعَذَابٍۢ [about a punishment] وَاقِعٍۢ [bound to happen]
لِّلْكَـٰفِرِينَ [To the disbelievers] لَيْسَ [not] لَهُۥ [of it] دَافِعٌۭ [any preventer]
مِّنَ [From] ٱللَّهِ [Allah] ذِى [Owner] ٱلْمَعَارِجِ [(of) the ways of ascent]

data.textUthmani: تَعْرُجُ ٱلْمَلَـٰٓئِكَةُ وَٱلرُّوحُ إِلَيْهِ فِى يَوْمٍ كَانَ مِقْدَارُهُۥ خَمْسِينَ أَلْفَ سَنَةٍ
data.wordByWord: تَعْرُجُ [Ascend] ٱلْمَلَـٰٓئِكَةُ [the Angels] وَٱلرُّوحُ [and the Spirit] إِلَيْهِ [to Him] فِى [in] يَوْمٍۢ [a Day] كَانَ [[is]] مِقْدَارُهُۥ [its measure] خَمْسِينَ [(is) fifty] أَلْفَ [thousand] سَنَةٍۢ [year(s)]
data.transliteration: TaAAruju almala-ikatu warroohuilayhi fee yawmin kana miqdaruhu khamseena alfasana

data.wordByWord: فَٱصْبِرْ [So be patient] صَبْرًۭا [a patience] جَمِيلًا [good]
إِنَّهُمْ [Indeed, they] يَرَوْنَهُۥ [see it] بَعِيدًۭا [(as) far off]
وَنَرَىٰهُ [But We see it] قَرِيبًۭا [near]
يَوْمَ [(The) Day ] تَكُونُ [will be] ٱلسَّمَآءُ [the sky] كَٱلْمُهْلِ [like molten copper]
وَتَكُونُ [And will be] ٱلْجِبَالُ [the mountains] كَٱلْعِهْنِ [like wool]
وَلَا [And not] يَسْـَٔلُ [will ask] حَمِيمٌ [a friend] حَمِيمًۭا [(about) a friend]

data.textUthmani: يُبَصَّرُونَهُمْ ۚ يَوَدُّ ٱلْمُجْرِمُ لَوْ يَفْتَدِى مِنْ عَذَابِ يَوْمِئِذٍۭ بِبَنِيهِ
data.wordByWord: يُبَصَّرُونَهُمْ ۚ [They will be made to see each other] يَوَدُّ [Would wish] ٱلْمُجْرِمُ [the criminal] لَوْ [if] يَفْتَدِى [he (could be) ransomed] مِنْ [from] عَذَابِ [(the) punishment] يَوْمِئِذٍۭ [(of) that Day] بِبَنِيهِ [by his children]
data.transliteration: Yubassaroonahum yawaddu almujrimu lawyaftadee min AAathabi yawmi-ithin bibaneeh

words.translation: They will be made to see each other

data.wordByWord: وَصَـٰحِبَتِهِۦ [And his spouse] وَأَخِيهِ [and his brother]
وَفَصِيلَتِهِ [And his nearest kindred] ٱلَّتِى [who] تُـْٔوِيهِ [sheltered him]

data.textUthmani: وَمَن فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ جَمِيعًا ثُمَّ يُنجِيهِ
data.wordByWord: وَمَن [And whoever] فِى [(is) on] ٱلْأَرْضِ [the earth] جَمِيعًۭا [all] ثُمَّ [then] يُنجِيهِ [it (could) save him]
كَلَّآ ۖ [By no means] إِنَّهَا [Indeed, it (is)] لَظَىٰ [surely a Flame of Hell]
نَزَّاعَةًۭ [A remover] لِّلشَّوَىٰ [of the skin of the head]

words.translation: of the skin of the head

data.wordByWord: تَدْعُوا۟ [Inviting] مَنْ [(him) who] أَدْبَرَ [turned his back] وَتَوَلَّىٰ [and went away]
وَجَمَعَ [And collected] فَأَوْعَىٰٓ [and hoarded]
۞ إِنَّ [Indeed] ٱلْإِنسَـٰنَ [the man] خُلِقَ [was created] هَلُوعًا [anxious ]
إِذَا [When] مَسَّهُ [touches him] ٱلشَّرُّ [the evil] جَزُوعًۭا [distressed]
وَإِذَا [And when] مَسَّهُ [touches him] ٱلْخَيْرُ [the good] مَنُوعًا [withholding]
إِلَّا [Except] ٱلْمُصَلِّينَ [those who pray ]
ٱلَّذِينَ [Those who] هُمْ [[they]] عَلَىٰ [at] صَلَاتِهِمْ [their prayer] دَآئِمُونَ [(are) constant]
وَٱلَّذِينَ [And those who] فِىٓ [in] أَمْوَٰلِهِمْ [their wealth] حَقٌّۭ [(is) a right] مَّعْلُومٌۭ [known]
لِّلسَّآئِلِ [For the one who asks] وَٱلْمَحْرُومِ [and the deprived]
وَٱلَّذِينَ [And those who] يُصَدِّقُونَ [accept (the) truth] بِيَوْمِ [(of the) Day] ٱلدِّينِ [(of) the Judgment]

data.textUthmani: وَٱلَّذِينَ هُم مِّنْ عَذَابِ رَبِّهِم مُّشْفِقُونَ
data.wordByWord: وَٱلَّذِينَ [And those who] هُم [[they]] مِّنْ [of] عَذَابِ [(the) punishment] رَبِّهِم [(of) their Lord] مُّشْفِقُونَ [(are) fearful ]
إِنَّ [Indeed] عَذَابَ [(the) punishment] رَبِّهِمْ [(of) your Lord] غَيْرُ [(is) not] مَأْمُونٍۢ [to be felt secure (of) ]
وَٱلَّذِينَ [And those who] هُمْ [[they]] لِفُرُوجِهِمْ [their modesty] حَـٰفِظُونَ [(are) guardians]

data.textUthmani: إِلَّا عَلَىٰٓ أَزْوَٰجِهِمْ أَوْ مَا مَلَكَتْ أَيْمَـٰنُهُمْ فَإِنَّهُمْ غَيْرُ مَلُومِينَ
data.wordByWord: إِلَّا [Except] عَلَىٰٓ [from] أَزْوَٰجِهِمْ [their spouses] أَوْ [or] مَا [what] مَلَكَتْ [they possess] أَيْمَـٰنُهُمْ [rightfully] فَإِنَّهُمْ [then indeed, they] غَيْرُ [(are) not] مَلُومِينَ [blameworthy]
data.transliteration: Illa AAala azwajihim awma malakat aymanuhum fa-innahum ghayru maloomeen

data.textUthmani: فَمَنِ ٱبْتَغَىٰ وَرَآءَ ذَٰلِكَ فَأُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلْعَادُونَ
data.wordByWord: فَمَنِ [But whoever] ٱبْتَغَىٰ [seeks] وَرَآءَ [beyond] ذَٰلِكَ [that] فَأُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ [then those] هُمُ [[they]] ٱلْعَادُونَ [(are) the transgressors ]
data.transliteration: Famani ibtagha waraa thalikafaola-ika humu alAAadoon

data.wordByWord: وَٱلَّذِينَ [And those who] هُمْ [[they]] لِأَمَـٰنَـٰتِهِمْ [of their trusts] وَعَهْدِهِمْ [and their promise] رَٰعُونَ [(are) observers]
وَٱلَّذِينَ [And those who] هُم [[they]] بِشَهَـٰدَٰتِهِمْ [in their testimonies] قَآئِمُونَ [stand firm]
وَٱلَّذِينَ [And those who] هُمْ [[they]] عَلَىٰ [on] صَلَاتِهِمْ [their prayer] يُحَافِظُونَ [keep a guard ]
أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ [Those] فِى [(will be) in] جَنَّـٰتٍۢ [Gardens] مُّكْرَمُونَ [honored]
فَمَالِ [So what is with] ٱلَّذِينَ [those who] كَفَرُوا۟ [disbelieve] قِبَلَكَ [before you] مُهْطِعِينَ [(they) hasten]
عَنِ [On] ٱلْيَمِينِ [the right] وَعَنِ [and on] ٱلشِّمَالِ [the left] عِزِينَ [(in) separate groups]

data.textUthmani: أَيَطْمَعُ كُلُّ ٱمْرِئٍ مِّنْهُمْ أَن يُدْخَلَ جَنَّةَ نَعِيمٍ
data.wordByWord: أَيَطْمَعُ [Does long] كُلُّ [every] ٱمْرِئٍۢ [person] مِّنْهُمْ [among them] أَن [that] يُدْخَلَ [he enters] جَنَّةَ [a Garden] نَعِيمٍۢ [(of) Delight]
data.transliteration: AyatmaAAu kullu imri-in minhum anyudkhala jannata naAAeem

data.wordByWord: كَلَّآ ۖ [By no means] إِنَّا [Indeed, We] خَلَقْنَـٰهُم [[We] have created them] مِّمَّا [from what] يَعْلَمُونَ [they know]

data.textUthmani: فَلَآ أُقْسِمُ بِرَبِّ ٱلْمَشَـٰرِقِ وَٱلْمَغَـٰرِبِ إِنَّا لَقَـٰدِرُونَ
data.wordByWord: فَلَآ [But nay] أُقْسِمُ [I swear] بِرَبِّ [by (the) Lord] ٱلْمَشَـٰرِقِ [(of) the risings] وَٱلْمَغَـٰرِبِ [and the settings] إِنَّا [that We] لَقَـٰدِرُونَ [(are) surely Able]
data.transliteration: Fala oqsimu birabbi almashariqiwalmagharibi inna laqadiroon

data.textUthmani: عَلَىٰٓ أَن نُّبَدِّلَ خَيْرًا مِّنْهُمْ وَمَا نَحْنُ بِمَسْبُوقِينَ
data.wordByWord: عَلَىٰٓ [[On]] أَن [to] نُّبَدِّلَ [[We] replace] خَيْرًۭا [(with) better] مِّنْهُمْ [than them] وَمَا [and not] نَحْنُ [We] بِمَسْبُوقِينَ [(are) to be outrun]
data.transliteration: AAala an nubaddila khayran minhum wamanahnu bimasbooqeen

data.textUthmani: فَذَرْهُمْ يَخُوضُوا۟ وَيَلْعَبُوا۟ حَتَّىٰ يُلَـٰقُوا۟ يَوْمَهُمُ ٱلَّذِى يُوعَدُونَ
data.wordByWord: فَذَرْهُمْ [So leave them] يَخُوضُوا۟ [(to) converse vainly] وَيَلْعَبُوا۟ [and amuse themselves] حَتَّىٰ [until] يُلَـٰقُوا۟ [they meet] يَوْمَهُمُ [their Day] ٱلَّذِى [which] يُوعَدُونَ [they are promised]
data.transliteration: Fatharhum yakhoodoowayalAAaboo hatta yulaqoo yawmahumu allatheeyooAAadoon

data.textUthmani: يَوْمَ يَخْرُجُونَ مِنَ ٱلْأَجْدَاثِ سِرَاعًا كَأَنَّهُمْ إِلَىٰ نُصُبٍ يُوفِضُونَ
data.wordByWord: يَوْمَ [(The) Day] يَخْرُجُونَ [they will come out] مِنَ [from] ٱلْأَجْدَاثِ [the graves] سِرَاعًۭا [rapidly] كَأَنَّهُمْ [as if they (were)] إِلَىٰ [to] نُصُبٍۢ [a goal] يُوفِضُونَ [hastening]
data.transliteration: Yawma yakhrujoona mina al-ajdathi siraAAankaannahum ila nusubin yoofidoon

data.textUthmani: خَـٰشِعَةً أَبْصَـٰرُهُمْ تَرْهَقُهُمْ ذِلَّةٌ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ ٱلْيَوْمُ ٱلَّذِى كَانُوا۟ يُوعَدُونَ
data.wordByWord: خَـٰشِعَةً [Humbled] أَبْصَـٰرُهُمْ [their eyesights] تَرْهَقُهُمْ [will cover them] ذِلَّةٌۭ ۚ [humiliation] ذَٰلِكَ [That] ٱلْيَوْمُ [(is) the Day] ٱلَّذِى [which] كَانُوا۟ [they were] يُوعَدُونَ [promised]
data.transliteration: KhashiAAatan absaruhumtarhaquhum thillatun thalika alyawmu allatheekanoo yooAAadoon
